name: Chicken Curry
description: A mild and creamy chicken curry. Very easy to make
preface: If you use chicken thighs, it is a good idea to precook them for an hour in a deep dish with water, salt and pepper
instructions: Prepare the ingredients by finely chopping the garlic, cutting the potato into small cubes and slicing the onion
Heat the oil in a wok and fry the onion, garlic and potato
Cut the chicken breast into pieces and add to the wok. Cook until the chicken is no longer pink on the outside
Stir in the flour. Add the water, curry paste and crumble in the stock cube and stir well
Bring to boil, then simmer for around 10 minutes (until all the vegetables and chicken are cooked)
Reduce the heat and mix in the yogurt. Heat for another minute but don't boil it
